pages.text: $(n)Tip #1:$() $(br)$(li)Add texture to your walls. $(br2)You can put a block palette together to help. $(br2)Look at $(thing)www.blockpalettes.com$() for some good ones!

pages.title: Depth
pages.text: $(n)Tip #2:$() $(br)$(li)Add depth to your buildings. $(br)It looks a lot more aesthetic!

pages.title: Overdetailing
pages.text: $(n)Tip #3:$() $(br)$(li)Don't overdetailing your builds! $(br2)In most cases too many details seem too overloaded.
